long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
************* 𝕭𝖊𝖘𝖙 𝕼𝕽 𝕮𝖔𝖉𝖊 𝕲𝖊𝖓𝖊𝖗𝖆𝖙𝖔𝖗 **************

this extension allow you to turn your URL link into a Qr Code and transfer id easy to your smartphone
○  Generate QR Code of your current page with just one click.
○  Free forever
○  no Ads
○  Super fast and works offline.
○  Able to generate QrCode text
○  Save and download image 
○  Change theme 


♣ This extension converts your current URL or anything into a QR Code immediately. It's a very handy QR Code 
    generator for you! It's the best QRCode Generator / QRCode Reader Chrome extension!

♣ To create a QR code with our extension, all you have to do is click the icon in your Chrome browser and scan it 
    Then, you will be able to download an image file with your code and use it on your own website, anywhere on 
    the internet. The sky is the limit!
